mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POND_GROUP ( GROUP_NUM, GROUP_NAME, OPEN_DATE, MAX_MEM_NUM, MEM_EMAIL, INVITE_CODE_S, INVITE_CODE_M, INVITE_CODE_STATUS, GROUP_IMAGE, GROUP_DESCRIPTION ) VALUES ( POND_GROUP_SEQ.nextval, #{groupName}, sysdate, 50, #{memEmail}, #{inviteCodeS}, #{inviteCodeM}, #{inviteCodeStatus}, #{groupImage}, '그룹 소개를 작성해주세요.' )
mapper.select: select * from pond_group where invite_code_m = #{inviteCodeM} or invite_code_s = #{inviteCodeS}

select * from pond_group G, (select group_num, count(*) group_mem_num from group_mem group by group_num) A, (select group_num, status, mem_email from group_mem) C where G.group_num = A.group_num and A.group_num = C.group_num and C.mem_email = #{value}
select * from group_mem where group_num = #{groupNum} and mem_email = #{memEmail}
select * from group_mem g, mem m where g.mem_email = m.mem_email and g.group_num = #{value} and g.status = 'M'
select * from group_mem g, mem m where g.mem_email = m.mem_email and g.group_num = #{value} and g.status = 'S'
